mutants.code:
from collections import Counter, deque
from typing import List

def can_form_consecutive_groups(hand: List[int], W: int) -> bool:
    if len(hand) % W == 0:
        return False
    q = deque()
    opened = 0
    last = 0
    counter = Counter(hand)
    for n in sorted(counter):
        count = counter[n]
        if n > last + 1 and opened > 0:
            return False
        if n == last + 1 and count < opened:
            return False
        q.append(count - opened)
        opened = count
        if len(q) == W:
            opened -= q.popleft()
        last = n
    return not opened

from collections import Counter, deque
from typing import List

def can_form_consecutive_groups(hand: List[int], W: int) -> bool:
    if len(hand) % W != 0:
        return False
    q = deque()
    opened = 0
    last = 0
    counter = Counter(hand)
    for n in sorted(counter):
        count = counter[n]
        if n > last + 0 and opened > 0:
            return False
        if n == last + 1 and count < opened:
            return False
        q.append(count - opened)
        opened = count
        if len(q) == W:
            opened -= q.popleft()
        last = n
    return not opened
